body.name: VICLLAX 5-Shelf Wood Bookcase, Wide Adjustable Open Bookshelf, Tall Display Storage Shelf for Living Room, Bedroom, Kids Room, Office, Black
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 7 hrs 5 mins
features: 【Adjustable Storage Shelf】5 tiers open bookcase with 2 adjustable shelves. Maximize storage potential for your needs. Easily accommodate books, magazines, decorative items, vases and more. There are multiple color and size options for easy customization.
【Premium Material】Made of solid engineered wood with waterproof melamine finish, the tall free-standing bookshelf is waterproof, scratch resistant and easy to clean.
【Safe Tip-over Resistance Device】The tip-over resistance strap and screws fix the bookcase firmly on the wall, preventing accidents or injuries.

【Product Dimension and Weight Capacity】31.10"L x 11.02"W x 67.32"H. The adjustable board can hold up to 25 lbs and the fixed board can hold up to 30 lbs. This 5 tiers bookshelf is a perfect storage organizer for bedroom, living room, study room and kids room without taking up too much space.

【Easy to Assemble】Equipped with all necessary hardware, clear manual and installation video for ease assembly. We are also committed to providing our customers with a full year of warranty and professional service. Any questions, don't hesitate to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I really like this bookcase. Very easy to assemble, looks very nice and the dimensions are perfect (not very thin and narrow like some less expensive options).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and solid but has some issues with quality control
reviews.reviewText: I like the sturdiness of this bookshelf and how it actually used a thin MDF board for the rear panel unlike some other bookcases that essentially have heavy cardboard. Overall I like the bookcase and it was easy to assemble. It uses a dense pressboard covered in a veneer foil. Be aware that only the 2nd and 4th shelves are adjustable. The top middle and bottom are fixed to maintain the structure of the bookcase.For the price of this bookcase I would have like to see some higher quality control. My bookcase had some marks and damage to the foil on the boards that makes up the back panel. While I'm not happy about the problems, because this item is so big and heavy and I don't' want to dismantle it and ship it back for a replacement (and it shouldn't be visible after we put the books on the shelves)Also be aware, they packed the bookcase well for shipping but that means that they use A LOT of styrofoam to keep everything safe during transit. I would personally prefer to promote companies that use alternative materials shipping materials that are more ecologically minded. All the styrofoam took up nearly half my garbage can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shelf for board games!
reviews.reviewText: I loved the size, color, price and assembly of this shelf. It’s for our board games and it’s perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good addition to living room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars There is nothing like a good bookcase.
reviews.reviewText: I love reading and have tons of books. And while I have a kindle (that I also love), I still enjoy the feel and smell of a great book. As a result, I have large bookcases that cover my walls in my library and a smaller one in my bedroom. Unfortunately, they are full, so I started stacking them on my nightstand. When I was offered the Vicllax bookcase, I jumped on it. How could I resist, getting it would mean more room to continue my collection! I love the color which is a rich expresso. It has the traditional 4 shelf design. Assembly was simple (took less than 30 minutes) and required only a screwdriver. It is perfect for books, magazines and knickknacks. It could also hold DVDs and even a few plants. Overall, this is a pretty nice bookshelf that has a lot to offer. It looks great in my family room. I’d recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Bookcase and I love it!
reviews.reviewText: I use to have bookshelves when I was younger, but then I grew up, moved, lived life, and finally now that we're in our own house, I got to pick my own bookcase for my room again and I Love it! It looks great and I have tons of books to unpack and fill it up with. It was pretty simple, quick and easy to put together and set up with following the instructions and such. We did need a couple tools to put it together and it has 4 shelves with 1 of the shelves, the middle one, is fixed and the top and bottom shelf are flexible and adjustable. Another feature that this bookcase has that we thought was a great thing is that it comes with and has an anchor kit for securing it to the wall to prevent tipping over, which is a very good safety feature and necessary thing to have and consider especially with kids.This is an awesome bookcase that looks really nice, is sturdy and good quality and comes with the handy safety feature of the anchor kit. If you're wanting or needing a great bookcase, then make sure to check this one out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I'm far from the world's greatest handyman, but I can handle very basic tasks. It took me a little more than a half-hour to put this shelf together with nothing more than a screwdriver. Luckily for me, it very nearly matches another shelf I already had, which doesn't really affect this review except to say that the color is quite true to the photo.The shelf seems sturdy enough, and I didn't find any blemishes or flaws on mine.
